global-css: "/* HENRY HARRISON */rnrna.eg-henryharrison-element-1,rna.eg-henryharrison-element-2 {rn  -webkit-transition: all .4s linear;  rn    -moz-transition: all .4s linear;  rn    -o-transition: all .4s linear;
